==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|おんな|ぞく|ちょう}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おんなぞくちょう|女|tr1=onna|t1=woman|族長|tr2=zokuchō|t2=head of a clan}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|おんな ぞくちょう}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おんな ぞくちょう}}

# a [[matriarch]], the [[female]] [[head]] of a [[family]] or [[clan]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|女家長|おんなかちょう}}

====See also====
* {{ja-r|族長|ぞくちょう}}: the [[head]] of a [[family]] or [[clan]]
* {{ja-r|家長|かちょう}}: the [[head]] of a [[household]], a [[householder]]
